    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public java.util.List<Restaurant> filter(java.util.List<Restaurant> restaurantList,
                                         java.lang.String searchWord)
        Search restaurant list for names that match search word.
        Parameters:
        restaurantList - all the known restaurants.
        searchWord - the word that is written in the search field.
        Returns:
        returns a list with the restaurant that matched the search word. If search word is empty or contains only whitespace the whole list is returned.

      • findNearestRestaurant

        public Restaurant findNearestRestaurant(java.util.List<Restaurant> restaurants,
                                        com.lynden.gmapsfx.javascript.object.LatLong userLocation)
        uses haversine formula to calculate which restaurant is nearest to user input address
        Parameters:
        restaurants - list of all restaurants
        userLocation - LatLong object for location given by user
        Returns:
        Restaurant object that is nearest to user provided address

        Parameters:

        Returns:
